[{"awards_id":1,"awards_name":"City of New York Proclamation Award","awards_details":"The council of the city of New York is proud to celebrate the 39th anniversary of Bangladeshi independence and to honor Abubokor Hanip for his outstanding service to the community.","awards_pic":"fhm6043717.jpg"},{"awards_id":2,"awards_name":"Awarded by US Ambassador to Bangladesh","awards_details":"This Honor is presented to Engr. Abubokor Hanip, PeopleNTech and its CEO. In recognition of his outstanding contribution through teaching Information Technology in a Real-time Project-based method and employing thousands of Bangladeshis to the corporate IT field in the USA with the slogan: Build-up IT career in corporate America: No More odd-jobs. Presented by: Former US Ambassador to Bangladesh. His Excellency Dan Mozena","awards_pic":"fhm814232.jpg"},{"awards_id":3,"awards_name":"PRIO BANGLA Appreciation award\r\n","awards_details":"Prio Bangla Appreciation award is presented to Abubokor Hanip In recognition of your exceptional and outstanding services to community by helping Bangladeshi youth For developing Their Career Path.","awards_pic":"fhm3896815.jpg"},{"awards_id":4,"awards_name":"Fobana-Silver Jubilee Award ","awards_details":"Fobana-Silver Jubilee Award Presented to Farhana Hanip corporate Business women of the year In recognition of your continued support.","awards_pic":"fhm8510560.jpg"},{"awards_id":5,"awards_name":"NRB Fashion Award-2011","awards_details":"PeopleNTech is awarded NRB Fashion Award-2011.","awards_pic":"fhm468367.jpg"},{"awards_id":6,"awards_name":"Awarded by Kulaura Sports Club USA Inc.","awards_details":"Kulaura Sports Club USA Presented to Abubokor Hanip In appreciation and Recognition for your loyal support and generous contribution towards Kulaura Sports Club USA Inc. July 1st, 2012","awards_pic":"fhm5918644.jpg"},{"awards_id":7,"awards_name":"Award of Fobana","awards_details":"Fobana 2014 is proud to honor Abu Hanip for his exceptional business success and being a parton of Fobana.","awards_pic":"20160416113408_fhm429878.jpg"},{"awards_id":8,"awards_name":"BCCDI Award","awards_details":"Bangladesh Center for Community Development Inc. (BCCDI) Presented to Mr. Abubokor Hanip Founder and President PeopleNTech, LLC. For his exemplary contribution to the Bengali community.","awards_pic":"20160416113506_fhm1938241.jpg"},{"awards_id":9,"awards_name":"Award of Bangladesh Association of Florida","awards_details":"Bangladesh Association of Florida Award Presented to PeopleNTech in Appreciation for your dedication and Support to the ASIAN TRADE, FOOD FAIR and CULTURAL SHOW, March 15-16,2014.","awards_pic":"20160416113623_fhm1599914.jpg"},{"awards_id":10,"awards_name":"Bangladesh American Community Council Award","awards_details":"BANGLADESH AMERICAN COMMUNITY COUNCIL B A C C Award Presented to Mr. Abubokor Hanip, President and CEO PeopleNTech, LLC. For his contribution to the community by providing quality computer education and improving the lives of our talented young individuals. Presented Hansen Clarke, US Congressman (ELECT).","awards_pic":"20160416113713_fhm1993796.jpg"},{"awards_id":11,"awards_name":"Award of Abima Garo Youth Association","awards_details":"Abima Garo Youth Association Award Excellence to Hon'ble Engr. Abubokor Hanip. The CEO of PeopleNTech, USA, in recognition of excellent community service in IT training and Job Placement around the world.","awards_pic":"20160416115725_fhm3237866.jpg"},{"awards_id":12,"awards_name":"Fobana Bangladesh Convention Award","awards_details":"This award is to honor Mohammad Abu Hanif in recognition of your enduring dedicated services and contribution for Bangladesh and our community. 22nd Fobana Bangladesh Convention - 2008. 3rd 6th july, 2008. Hotel Hilton, New York.","awards_pic":"20160416115749_fhm4016204.jpg"},{"awards_id":13,"awards_name":"Award of America Bangladesh Canada Convention","awards_details":"ABC Convention Recognizes Abubokor Hanip Outstanding dedication, Innovation and remarkable achievement in the field of community and public service which reflects aspiration of peace, humanity, promote solidarity building up bridges between home and abroad and advancement for the whole world and mankind.","awards_pic":"20160416115828_fhm4600399.jpg"},{"awards_id":14,"awards_name":"American Association of Bangladesh","awards_details":"American association of Bangladeshi Engineers and architects New York chapter Honors Abubokor Hanip M.S, As the engineer of the year 2012. For Your Outstanding Contributing to the engineering profession and in leaving the organization to achive its aims and goals.","awards_pic":"20160416115951_thm3237866.jpg"},{"awards_id":15,"awards_name":"Certificate of Appreciation by Udoyon","awards_details":"PeopleNTech is awarded Certificate of Appreciation by Udoyon to PeopleNTech Mr. Hanip and Mrs. Hanip in recognition of valuable contribution to the fusion in 2013","awards_pic":"20160416120207_fhm4840416.jpg"},{"awards_id":16,"awards_name":"The Weekly Bangladesh Award","awards_details":"PeopleNTech is awarded The weekly Bangladesh award for excellence in information technology skills Eng. Abubokor Hanip in 2011, 1st May.","awards_pic":"20160416120354_fhm8435712.jpg"},{"awards_id":17,"awards_name":"The council of New York City - Award","awards_details":"The council of New York City -recognized PeopleNTech in 2009 for exemplifying very best of the Bangladeshi-American community in efforts to help countless people find rewarding careers in IT.","awards_pic":"20160416120423_fhm2184449.jpg"},{"awards_id":18,"awards_name":"Bangladesh Association of Florida- Awarded in 2014","awards_details":"Bangladesh Association of Florida- Awarded in 2014 for contributing in the community by helping people learn Information Technology and secure employment.","awards_pic":"20160416120442_fhm44251.jpg"},{"awards_id":19,"awards_name":"Nobel Laureate Professor Muhammad Yunus awarded PeopleNTech in 2013","awards_details":"Nobel Laureate Professor Muhammad Yunus awarded PeopleNTech in 2013 for exemplifying the very best of the Bangladeshi-American community in efforts to help countless people find rewarding careers in IT through PeopleNTech.","awards_pic":"20160416120531_fhm6241456.jpg"},{"awards_id":20,"awards_name":"U.S. Ambassador to Bangladesh Dan Mozena- awarded PeopleNTech in 2014","awards_details":"U.S. Ambassador to Bangladesh Dan Mozena- awarded PeopleNTech in 2014 for contributing in community by teaching Information Technology in Real-time project-based method and employing thousands of Bangladeshis in the IT field from the odd-jobs with the slogan: Build-up IT career in corporate America: No more brain-drain","awards_pic":"20160416120552_fhm1535645.jpg"}]
